author: Elastic
description: Identifies when a terminal (tty) is spawned via Python. Attackers may upgrade a simple reverse shell to a fully interactive tty after obtaining initial access to a host.
name: Interactive Terminal Spawned via Python
query:
sequence with maxspan=20s
  [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and process.name : "python*"] by process.entity_id
  [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and 
   process.executable : (
      "/bin/bash",
      "/bin/sh",
      "/bin/dash",
      "/bin/csh",
      "/bin/zsh",
      "/bin/ksh",
      "/bin/tcsh",
      "/bin/fish",
      "/bin/ash",
      "/bin/bsh"
   )
  ] by process.parent.entity_id
